Welcome aboard !
I am A, your training robot.
First of all, move with WASD to the table.
Aarning : without the Identification Card(ID), yo can't open any doors. Always keep your ID with you !

Equip the clothes on the table by getting it with left click,
and equipping it with E."

To take less place in your inventory, you can insert your PDA in your Identification Card by selectionning the latter and clicking on the former !
You can also switch hands with the key X.

It's so dark ! I might lose sight of you, but you can't always interact and especially pull me by right clicking me and chose your action.
You can also toggle the light integrated on your PDA, like as a lighthouse in a dark world, but only on 2m...
No?
I don't need one, I'm a robot after all.
My sensor detect, an irregular amount of toxic CO2 in the next room at west Equip the mask and the oxygen stocked in the bag, and don't forget to turn your oxygen on !

Be careful, there is a hole in the floor on the next room. You need to be ready : equip the space suit to protect yourself from the harsh environment, I think the rest of you organically don't appreciate being exposed to the vacuum of space. Objective : use the items in this room to repare the hole by using the rod on the empty space, then use floor tile on the scaffold to build a base tile and lastly use the last one to finish the floor tile !

Congratulation on completing your first mission !
you have earned a reward: you can rest here, eat and drink here, just click on the machines and see what they give you !
You can even throw drinks and packaging on the floor, don't worry, I will clean up after you leave."
"From now, you can leave the station by south or continue discovering the station. If you have any doubt about what you see, you can do a right click or a Shift click to examine."

This is the Firearm Training Ground, you can train your aim and the guns here.
Remember to not waste your ammo in real situation !"

This is a medbay, where you can heal your wounds here.
There should be medical care inside the kit !"

Look at this room ! Here you can farm food, that are essential to survival ! for you who have to eat.
Take a seed from the Mega Seed Servitor, plant it in the Hydroponics Tray and wait for it to grow !
You can add water, use the bucket to add or remove water, the Spade to dig and move dirt, and the Cultivator to remove weeds.
When the plant has grow, you can take them and not only eat them, but you can also put one in the Seed Extractor to extract information from the seed !

It seem like you can leave this place here.
Thank you for coming, and good luck for your future missions !"
